name: Norwegian Premium Economy Review: DISAPPOINTING!
description:
Here's my Norwegian Premium Economy review, onboard a Boeing 787 Dreamliner from Seattle to London.

I was looking forward to trying Norwegian Premium Economy after hearing some positive things about it. Sadly my experience was not as positive, and an uncomfortable seat and surly crew led to a pretty disappointing flight.

Airline: Norwegian Air UK
Flight: DI7132
Date: 8 April 2019
Aircraft: Boeing 787-9 G-CKWC
From: Seattle (SEA)
To: London (LGW)
Departure: 14:08
Arrival: 07:17
Flight Time: 9:09
Seat: 6A
